header: The Work of the Holy Spirit

verse: Some of the followers said to each other, “What does Jesus mean when he says, ‘After a little while you will not see me, and then after a little while you will see me again’? And what does he mean when he says, ‘Because I am going to the Father’?”
They also asked, “What does he mean by ‘a little while’? We don’t understand what he is saying.”

Jesus saw that the followers wanted to ask him about this. So Jesus said to the followers, “Are you asking each other what I meant when I said, ‘After a little while you will not see me. And then after a little while you will see me again’?
Then the followers of Jesus said, “You are speaking clearly to us now. You are not using words that are hard to understand.
We can see now that you know all things. You can answer a person’s question even before he asks it. This makes us believe that you came from God.”
